name: Alien Infiltration II
overview: A selective answers adventure by Cheryl de Boissiere and published in Loadstar #181 in 1999. In this sequel to the original Alien Infiltration you play this time as Ray Wencube, homicide detective. 3 weeks ago, you and your partner, James Clark, were investigating the metropolis dockside mutilation murders. Your primary suspect was Pete Whirry, the Garbage King. Lea Lison, star reporter walked into your stakeout and you were forced to take her along with you. Then things really get crazy!
